abilities.name: Delicate Precision
abilities.description: Reroll wound rolls of 1

command_ability.name: Excess of Violence
command_ability.description: Select a Slaanesh Daemon unit within 12." In your next combat phase, that unit can be selected to pile in and attack twice, instead of only once.

magic.name: Cacophonic Choir
magic.description: If successfully cast, roll 2 dice; each enemy unit within 6" of the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds if their bravery is less than the total rolled.

magic.name: Soulsnare Shackles
magic.description: Set up first shackle wholly w/n 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third models wholly w/n 6" if the first. At the start of the movement phase roll a dice for each unit w/n 6" of any soulsnare shackle model. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.

magic.name: Arcane Bolt
magic.description: Pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mw, if the casting roll is 10+, that unit suffers D3 mw's

magic.name: Mystic Shield
magic.description: Pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Reroll save rolls of 1 until your next hero phase

command_trait.name: Lord of War
command_trait.description: Choose a friendly CHAOS unit within 3" and roll a dice. On a 4+ that unit gains +1 to hit until the next hero phase

artefact.name: Ghyrstrike
artefact.description: +1 to hit, +1 to wound a melee weapon.

phases.name: Excess of Violence
phases.description: Select a Slaanesh Daemon unit within 12." In your next combat phase, that unit can be selected to pile in and attack twice, instead of only once.

phases.description: Set up first shackle wholly w/n 12" of the caster, then set up the second and third models wholly w/n 6" if the first. At the start of the movement phase roll a dice for each unit w/n 6" of any soulsnare shackle model. On a 3+ halve the move characteristic of that unit until the end of that phase. On a 6 that unit also suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Grace
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Ravaging Claw is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

abilities.name: Discordant Disruption
abilities.description: Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy Wizards that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that Wizard suffers D3 mws after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.

abilities.name: Harmonic Alignment
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, each friendly Infernal Rapturess that is part of a Slaanesh army and on the battlefield generates 1 Depravity point for her army.

phases.name: Deadly Grace
phases.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Ravaging Claw is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

phases.name: Discordant Disruption
phases.description: Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy Wizards that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that Wizard suffers D3 mws after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.

phases.name: Harmonic Alignment
phases.description: At the start of your hero phase, each friendly Infernal Rapturess that is part of a Slaanesh army and on the battlefield generates 1 Depravity point for her army.

abilities.name: Slaanesh Daemon
abilities.description: When your opponent selects a unit within 3" of the Daemon Prince to pile in and attack in the combat phase, you can immediately select the Daemon Prince to pile in and attack before the enemy unit, even though it is not your turn to do so. This model can only so this if it has not already attacked in this phase.

phases.name: Slaanesh Daemon
phases.description: When your opponent selects a unit within 3" of the Daemon Prince to pile in and attack in the combat phase, you can immediately select the Daemon Prince to pile in and attack before the enemy unit, even though it is not your turn to do so. This model can only so this if it has not already attacked in this phase.

herald_on_exalted_seeker_chariot.name: Herald of Slaanesh on Exalted Seeker Chariot

abilities.name: Swirling Shapes and Unholy Hues
abilities.description: Your opponent must add 1 to the result of any battleshock tests made for units within 3" of any Chariot that charged that turn.

abilities.name: Exalted Excess of Blades
abilities.description: After this model makes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy model within 1." On a roll of 4 or more, that model's unit suffers D3 mws.

abilities.name: Deadly Grace
abilities.description: Each time you make a hit roll of 6 or more for this model's Flensing Whips or Piercing Claws, it can immediately make one extra attack using the same weapon.

abilities.name: Disturbing Beauty
abilities.description: Your opponent must subtract 1 from all hit rolls made for Heroes when they target this model.

abilities.name: Blissbringer
abilities.description: Leader can re-roll wound rolls of 1 made with the Deadly Pincers in the combat phase

abilities.name: Crushing Grip
abilities.description: If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with Deadly Pincers is 6, that attack has a dmg of D3 instead of 1.

abilities.name: Deadly Venom
abilities.description: An attack made with a Barbed Stinger has dmg of 1 (1 wound enemy), D3 (2-3 wound enemy), or D6 (4+ wound enemy)

abilities.name: Disruptive Song
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy Wizards while they are within 12" of one or more models with this ability.

abilities.name: Locus of Grace
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by this unit while this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly Daemon Slaanesh Hero.

abilities.name: Sporific Musk
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit. In addition while this unit has 4 or more models, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit.

melee_weapons.name: Barbed Stinger
melee_weapons.damage: 1 (1 wound enemy), D3 (2-3 wound enemy), or D6 (4+ wound enemy)

abilities.name: Alluress
abilities.description: Add 1 to the attacks characteristic of an Alluress's Piercing Claws

abilities.name: Standard Bearers
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by a unit that includes any standard bearers.

abilities.name: Icon Bearers
abilities.description: If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for a unit that includes any icon bearers is 1, you can add D6 models to that unit, and no models from that unit will flee in that battleshock phase.

abilities.name: Hornblower
abilities.description: If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.

abilities.name: Sadisitic Killers
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Piercing Claws is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. While this unit has 20 or more models, attacks inflicts 2 hits on an unmodified roll of 5 or 6, instead of only on a 6

abilities.name: Lithe and Swift
abilities.description: This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

abilities.name: Locus of Excruciation
abilities.description: Re-roll unmodified hit rolls of 6 for attacks made with melee weapons that target this unit while this unit is wholly within 9" of a friendly Daemon Slaanesh Hero
